title: Maria Spano
text:
I am a Tenure-Track Assistant Professor (RTDB) in Statistics for Social Science at the University of Naples Federico II, Department of Economics and Statistics.
My research interests include:

Text Mining and Statistical Analysis of Textual Data
Social Media and Sentiment Analysis
Science Mapping and Bibliometrics
Data Mining and Document Clustering

Since 2024, I have been a permanent member of the Scientific Committee of the International Conference on Statistical Analysis of Textual Data (JADT), and I collaborate on national and international research projects in the field of applied statistics and data science.
You can find more details about my academic profile and projects throughout this website. .
